comment.author: 54724011@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Colliery & Mine Photos, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Excellent historic shot

comment.author: 52806365@N00
comment._content: New South Wale State Library have this image dated September 1942 from GPO photographic service Government Printing Office 1 - 23803 acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=192715 My research has this as Kandos No. 2 colliery which operated from 1937 to 1961 At the time, the most modern and mechanised coal mine in the Australian coalfields. Considered by the Miners' Federation of Australia as the "model pit" to be emulated across the industry (ref 'Common Cause' issues 1947-1948)
